title: Quick Tab Storage Sync Fix v1.6.4
details:
Fixed critical Quick Tab Manager sync issues:

1. Storage persistence after destroy - Added _persistToStorage() to DestroyHandler.js
2. Storage persistence after minimize/restore - Added _persistToStorage() to VisibilityHandler.js
3. Storage area mismatch - Settings now uses storage.local (not sync)
4. Message handlers - Added CLOSE/MINIMIZE/RESTORE_QUICK_TAB in content.js
5. Shared utilities - Created src/utils/storage-utils.js with generateSaveId(), getBrowserStorageAPI()
6. Hash collision - background.js now tracks saveId in globalQuickTabState

Key patterns:
- Use minimizedManager.isMinimized(id) for consistent minimized state
- Storage format: { tabs: [...], saveId, timestamp }
- All Quick Tab storage uses storage.local (not sync)
- Mock storage-utils in tests via jest.config.cjs moduleNameMapper
